headline: A Highly Caffeinated Trek Through Aromatic Costa Rica
abstract: Coffee is one of the country’s top exports. A four-day tasting journey to haciendas and plantations follows the beans from tree to cup.
lead_paragraph: “Coffee,” said Buzzy O’Keeffe, the owner of the renowned River Café, in Brooklyn, “is the last thing a restaurant diner tastes — so it better be good.”
